items.text: length ball on middle, and he covers his off stumps to defend
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he covers his off stumps to defend
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and he works this off his pads to the leg side. Stopped by midwicket
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he miscues a pulled shot over the infield
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle, and worked away to square leg
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off, and he guides a tap to point
items.postText: Mohammad Isam: "It appeared Tamim was trying to calm Mushfiqur who seemed agitated with something being said in the dressing room."
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and he punches towards mid-on for a quick single
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and the outswinger is mistimed to cover. Tries to drive, but splices the shot
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and worked away to the vacant square-leg region for a quick single
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, but he shuffles inside the delivery's line, before nudging it behind square to the fielder in the deep
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off, and he tries to cut. Can't get bat on ball, though
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full on off, and wild inswing from Lockie. Mahmudullah is hurried onto his on-drive, mistimed to the leg side
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and Mahmudullah gets behind the line of the ball. Defends thereafter
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off again. Mahmudullah tries to slap a cut, but he's beaten for pace
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and he defends off the back foot
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off, and he tries to cut. Ball stays low, and sneaks under his bat
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball angling in, and worked away to deep backward square for one
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: straight to deep square leg! Length ball on middle, and Mahmudullah backs away to make some room. Slogs towards deep midwicket, but he toe-ends the shot, and Munro takes another skyer
items.postText: Time for a drinks break too
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, OUT

dismissal.text: Mahmudullah c Munro b de Grandhomme 16 (57m 36b 1x4 1x6) SR: 44.44

items.text: full outside off, hint of swing away, defended to cover
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length, angled in, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.preText: Prasu: "I dont think there will be a major turn-around w.r.t BD's performamces in Tests, most of the members in odi's are regulars in tests too"
items.text: full outside off, driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length, angled into the body, gets behind the line and defends it solidly
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: short outside off, let through to the keeper
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length, angled in, tucked away to fine-leg
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.text: short ball, too high, called wide and a great take by the keeper, who was airborne as he collected it
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 wide
